description:
An open-source alternative to Claude Cowork, powered by OpenCode

OpenWork is an extensible, open-source “Claude Work” style system for knowledge workers.
It’s a native desktop app that runs OpenCode under the hood, but presents it as a clean, guided workflow:
- pick a workspace
- start a run
- watch progress + plan updates
- approve permissions when needed
- reuse what works (templates + skills)
The goal: make “agentic work” feel like a product, not a terminal.
Highlights
- Added orchestrator router-status preflight checks and direct-send arguments to improve routing reliability.
- Reduced repository and package weight by removing unreferenced PNG screenshot/icon assets.
Fixes & polish
- Kept package versions aligned across app, desktop, orchestrator, server, and opencode-router for v0.11.87.
- Updated AUR packaging metadata for the current release line.
Packaging / ops
- Published tag v0.11.87 from dev via the standard release flow (release:prepare + release:ship).
